analysis.description:
IndividualLockableToken.setReleaseTime (/unique_contracts/0x834e26427dc74bf4107ccd18dec4a84ae362a23d.sol#587-603) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_release_time >= block.timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0x834e26427dc74bf4107ccd18dec4a84ae362a23d.sol#593-594)

IndividualLockableToken.getLockedBalance (/unique_contracts/0x834e26427dc74bf4107ccd18dec4a84ae362a23d.sol#686-699) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= userLock[_holder].release_time (/unique_contracts/0x834e26427dc74bf4107ccd18dec4a84ae362a23d.sol#691-696)

IndividualLockableToken.getFreeBalance (/unique_contracts/0x834e26427dc74bf4107ccd18dec4a84ae362a23d.sol#700-712) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
